EmailTemplate.description: VILT Welcome email for the Europe English ECM Programme
EmailTemplate.name: ECM Welcome Europe Open Enrollment VILT English
EmailTemplate.subject: Enterprise Change Management Boot Camp | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Associated_Training_Contacts__c.Contact__c},
Our Instructor, {!Training_Event__c.Instructor__c}, and our Training Success Specialist, {!Training_Event__c.Training_Manager__c}, look forward to welcoming you next week onto the {!Training_Event} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
Our goal is to equip you to understand current levels of capability, clearly define your organisation's future state, and begin to lay a path forward toward reaching the desired level of organisational capability.
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 20 minutes to complete the pre-work.
Set-up your Prosci Portal Access and Prework tasks
You will receive an email shortly from portal@prosci.com with access to resources and tools to support your in-programme learning.
Watch "What is Enterprise Change Management?" from Prosci’s Tim Creasey to gain a basic understanding of enterprise-wide change management (2 minutes)
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to be live online
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
To add this to your Outlook Calendar, please click on the attachment.
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training.
What You Need for Success as a Virtual Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. In the virtual environment, the following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
Uninterrupted time to focus. Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility High-speed internet connection Webcam capable of streaming you by video Audio headset or audio connection with speaker and microphone
You will receive an email a few days before your programme that will include specific information on how to access your session via your virtual meeting link/ID
Our delivery team will be online 15 minutes before the start of class each day. We ask that you join early to confirm that your technology is working.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
CONNECT WITH US:
Prosci Europe SRL (comprising the former Prosci affiliates CMC Partnership and Nexum) is the new European division of Prosci, operating in Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, the UK and Switzerland. See https://www.proscieurope.com/prosci-europe for the list of registered offices.
This email and any attachment(s) are private and confidential and intended solely for use by the addressee. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender and remove it entirely from your system immediately. Copying, distributing or relying on the contents of an email sent in error is strictly prohibited. Please note that the views of the author may not necessarily reflect those of Prosci Europe SRL. Your information is protected and managed as detailed within the company’s Privacy Policy at https://proscieurope.com/legal/privacy-en.pdf. Prosci UK Ltd. Registered in England and Wales. Registered Address: 2 Kingdom Street, 6th Floor, Paddington, London, W2 6BD, Registered Number: 04358177
